content: from ring finger knit these 16 18 18 st in round until middle finger measures 2 75 3 3 5 inches or desired length k2tog for one round break yarn and thread tail through remaining stitches and fasten off work index finger place remaining 15 15 17 st on needle join yarn and knit these stitches and pick up two st along base of co edge from middle finger k these 17 17 19 sts in the round until index finger measures 2 5 3 3 25 inches or desired length k2tog for one round ending k1 break yarn and thread tail through remaining stitches and fasten_off work pinky finger place held 8 10 10 stitches on needle join yarn and knit these stitches and pick up two st along base of co edge from ring finger knit these 10 12 12 stitches in the round until pinky finger measures 1 ¾ 2 2 ¼ inches or desired length k2tog for one round ending k1 break yarn and thread tail through remaining stitches and fasten_off work thumb place held 15 17 19 sts on needle join yarn and knit these stitches and pick up one stitch in base of co stitch in hand knit these 16 18 20 sts in the round until thumb measures 1 75 2 2 5 inches k2tog for one round break yarn and thread tail through remaining stitches and fasten_off weave in all ends gently wash and lay flat to dry block lightly if needed ©2009 susan iding for personal non-commercial use only p age | 5 chart ©2009 susan iding for personal non-commercial use only
